column5: Fight for the troops is on tonight apparently you can watch the first 4 fights on facebook....interesting eh?...im going to have to read and give it a try ..   http://www.ufc.com/   all ya have to do is "like" the page and you should be good to go    http://www.facebook.com/UFC?v=app_4949752878
It,s on spike for free. What ya talking about Willis?  FB can kiss,,,,,,,,,,
i know B but Ive come accustomed to watching it on the comp...what i find interesting is its going to be a LIVE feed through the social network...
The main card is on SPIKE, there's 4 live prelims on facebook
Thanks Steve. I,ll check my connection on the web and see if they are showing it.   Ya me too twocoda.Get to watch on the big screen tonight for FREE.

http://members.shaw.ca/atunstall/newtv/special  I have been using this for a bit now.. and you can even chat with the guy that runs it.. his name in the chat is freedom.. he is the middleman.. and finds the channels broadcasting the fights etc...  I am watching the prelims on special channel 24... (green buttons located at the bottom... (different the the main channels.)  G
